entity.name: The OVOS Foundation (Stichting OVOS) - OpenVoiceOS
entity.description: OpenVoiceOS is a community-driven, open-source voice AI platform dedicated to creating customizable voice-controlled interfaces with a focus on privacy and security.

projects.name: OpenVoiceOS
projects.description: OpenVoiceOS provides an open-source alternative to proprietary voice assistant platforms such as platforms offered by major companies like Amazon, Google, and Apple.

channels.description: We accept direct bank transfers. Please email for details.
Payments up to €5000,- per month can be made via Patreon.
Payments up to €5000,- per month or as one time can be made via Github sponsors.

plans.name: Ensure Sustainable Open Development
plans.description: Maintain and expand OpenVoiceOS as a fully open-source project by securing sustainable funding for hosting, development, and long-term maintenance.

plans.name: Expand Device Compatibility
plans.description: Support additional hardware platforms, including Raspberry Pi, embedded Linux devices, and smart home integrations.

plans.name: Improve Privacy and Offline Capabilities
plans.description: Enhance privacy-focused features such as offline voice processing, self-hosted AI models, and local speech-to-text processing.

plans.name: Fund Developer Bounties and Grants
plans.description: Create a bounty program to incentivize community developers to contribute features, bug fixes, and improvements.

plans.name: Fund OVOS Persona Development
plans.description: Support the development of OVOS Persona, enabling users to create and customize unique AI assistant identities with enhanced voice personalization.
